sentence0.sentece_text: Using Saccharomyces cerevisiae as an experimental model, the potential toxicological effects of oxidized multi-walled carbon nanotubes (MWCNTs) were investigated following exposure to 0-600mg/L for 24h.

sentence1.sentece_text: Results indicated that MWCNTs (>100mg/L) had adverse effects on the cell proliferation.

sentence2.sentece_text: The uptake kinetics data demonstrated that the maximum MWCNTs content (209.61mg/g) was reached at 3h, and a steady state was reached after 18h.
